block_comment: The block assigns the `wr_data_addr` based on `col_wr_data_buf_addr` when the condition for the preceding if-statement is not met. This control structure essential in directing the value assignment of `wr_data_addr` based on the conditions fulfilled by the system at that instance. The `begin` and `end` keywords are used to group this assignment operation hence separating the `else` branch from other code blocks.
